headline: Timken invokes Lia Thomas in new Ohio Senate ad
author: Julia Manchester
sentences: The ad comes as the debate over transgender women competing in women’s sports intensified after Thomas, who competes for the University of Pennsylvania, became the first openly transgender athlete to win an NCAA Division 1 national championship in any sport earlier this month.

Ohio Republican Senate candidate Jane Timken invoked Lia Thomas in a new campaign ad criticizing rules allowing transgender women being allowed to compete in women’s sports.
